author: djencks
msg: KARAF-424 include the license, notice, readme, and release notes in the framework kar like in the apache-karaf server.  I don't particularly like this but we need to get them  in somehow

author: norman
msg: Allow to access raw message header without parsing it. This will give us some possibilities to improve performance in imap and pop3. See MAILBOX-115

author: djencks
msg: KARAF-819 use full symbolic-name style names for features and feature repositories.  This commit changes them all to start with org.apache.karaf.feature.
